Two users reused a prime when creating their RSA keys. Can you recover the flag from the ciphertext? 290157052544743994078006798513715304669129781451967014178084023645041201579153196273794744882279305042681563730283149269088341504318459694151950388512870142336166741713289852096158697326528540288182176697083269324500100678224697622

The flag format is flag{...}
n=717815200639399939588132852013549275850725004986500172255281734903393148642701942865349536523469186246389824701372064452684300416617702418888723200801765434165760104618172743122445261981553634671321233378307473335630740611528809457, n2=871352701319447911818747153272858541967590629678094646526610474406632443235374627923772254958810860544916794966376304322972961910072975786509334198654136351750980030075368454848430961583008654700429786140089207544324680186525602311, e=173105751678580150160964278332096026023830854179974941626456447397048763643367667234878081990288688585913932852280388413548297608205786096540506720402264732455454196290952931915529158335198189322238034054404646114341417234105474421

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{2xtnul2m}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 290157052544743994078006798513715304669129781451967014178084023645041201579153196273794744882279305042681563730283149269088341504318459694151950388512870142336166741713289852096158697326528540288182176697083269324500100678224697622
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=717815200639399939588132852013549275850725004986500172255281734903393148642701942865349536523469186246389824701372064452684300416617702418888723200801765434165760104618172743122445261981553634671321233378307473335630740611528809457, n2=871352701319447911818747153272858541967590629678094646526610474406632443235374627923772254958810860544916794966376304322972961910072975786509334198654136351750980030075368454848430961583008654700429786140089207544324680186525602311, e=173105751678580150160964278332096026023830854179974941626456447397048763643367667234878081990288688585913932852280388413548297608205786096540506720402264732455454196290952931915529158335198189322238034054404646114341417234105474421
extra_info: p=23308168289977479896084169309164004009504220623883997622232160611330356731874550698796124401585550025391601077244321, q=30796722921726145001529726374121090091760083563672843984060534153437616634253115786739012180410169845567807028136017, q2=37384005919252344797482957667796005543264258200111567723900174661419786265748096417539935317210803495891661896897191, φ(n)=717815200639399939588132852013549275850725004986500172255281734903393148642701942865349536523469186246389824701372010347793088712992804804993039915707664169861572547776566450427680494008187507004835698241725477615759781203423429120, φ(n2)=871352701319447911818747153272858541967590629678094646526610474406632443235374627923772254958810860544916794966376243630798752680248282219382357238644583583272156034510022322513158211440011032053313450080370411190803396923551460800
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
